description.zh-cn: 原中华人民共和国国务委员、国防部部长，中央军委原委员，中国人民解放军陆军原上将。因卷入2023年中国火箭军腐败案落马，于2024年被开除党籍和军籍。
description.en: Former State Councilor and Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China, former member of the Central Military Commission, and former General of the People's Liberation Army Ground Force. He was dismissed in connection with the 2023 corruption case in the PLA Rocket Force and was expelled from the party and military in 2024.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国务院

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院
en: State Council of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家行政机关，即中央人民政府。
description.en: The chief administrative authority of the People's Republic of China, i.e., the Central People's Government.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国国防部

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国防部
en: Ministry of National Defense of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院主管国防事务的组成部门。
description.en: The constituent department of the State Council of the People's Republic of China that oversees national defense affairs.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的最高军事领导机构。
description.en: The highest military command and control institution of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军事委员会主席。
description.en: Chinese politician, currently the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China, President of the People's Republic of China, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，曾任国务委员、国防部部长。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, former State Councilor and Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军上将，现任中华人民共和国国防部部长。
description.en: An admiral in the People's Liberation Army Navy, currently the Minister of National Defense of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 位于湖南省长沙市，是中央军事委员会直属的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: Located in Changsha, Hunan, it is a comprehensive research university directly under the Central Military Commission.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国重庆市的综合性研究型大学。
description.en: A comprehensive research university in Chongqing, China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

zh-cn: 中国西昌卫星发射中心

description.zh-cn: 位于中国四川省的航天发射中心。
description.en: A space launch center located in Sichuan province, China.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总装备部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总装备部

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会下设的四总部之一，负责解放军的武器装备工作。后被中央军委装备发展部取代。
description.en: Formerly one of the four general headquarters under the Central Military Commission, responsible for the weaponry and equipment of the PLA. It was later replaced by the Equipment Development Department of the CMC.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总装备部司令部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总装备部司令部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总装备部的下属部门。
description.en: A subordinate department of the PLA General Armaments Department.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军战略支援部队
en: People's Liberation Army Strategic Support Force

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的一个军种，负责太空、网络和电子战。
description.en: A former service branch of the People's Liberation Army, responsible for space, cyber, and electronic warfare.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军上将，现任中共中央政治局委员、中央军事委员会副主席。
description.en: A general in the People's Liberation Army, currently a member of the Politburo of the CPC Central Committee and Vice Chairman of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会装备发展部

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会装备发展部

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的职能部门之一，负责全军装备发展规划、采购、研发和试验鉴定。
description.en: One of the functional departments of the Central Military Commission, responsible for the planning, procurement, R&D, and testing of military equipment.

description.zh-cn: 美国联邦政府负责外交事务的行政部门。
description.en: The executive department of the U.S. federal government responsible for foreign affairs.

zh-cn: 以制裁反制美国敌人法案
en: Countering America's Adversaries Through Sanctions Act

description.zh-cn: 一部美国联邦法律，对伊朗、朝鲜和俄罗斯实施制裁。
description.en: A United States federal law that imposed sanctions on Iran, North Korea, and Russia.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会
en: 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央权力机关。
description.en: The central authority of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 2023年起，中国人民解放军火箭军及中央军委装备发展部发生大规模腐败案，导致多名高级将领被查处。
description.en: Starting in 2023, a large-scale corruption case occurred in the PLA Rocket Force and the CMC Equipment Development Department, leading to the investigation of multiple senior generals.

nodes.id: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会
en: Discipline Inspection Commission of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 负责维护军队纪律和查处违纪违法案件的机构。
description.en: The body responsible for maintaining military discipline and investigating cases of disciplinary and legal violations.

nodes.id: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会
十四届全国人大常委会
en: Standing Committee of the 14th National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 第十四届全国人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The permanent body of the 14th National People's Congress.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央政治局

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央政治局
en: Politburo of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构之一。
description.en: One of the central leading bodies of the Communist Party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第三次全体会议

zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会召开的第三次全体会议。
description.en: The third plenary session of the 20th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国工农红军老兵，曾任中国人民解放军铁道兵西南指挥部副司令员。
description.en: A veteran of the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army, who served as the deputy commander of the Southwest Command of the PLA Railway Corps.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军铁道兵西南指挥部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军铁道兵西南指挥部

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军铁道兵在西南地区的指挥机构。
description.en: The command organization of the PLA Railway Corps in the Southwest region.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福出生于四川省成都市。
description.en: Li Shangfu was born in Chengdu, Sichuan.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军国防科技大学

description.zh-cn: 1982年毕业于中国人民解放军国防科技大学。
description.en: Graduated from the National University of Defense Technology in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福是重庆大学的校友。
description.en: Li Shangfu is an alumnus of Chongqing University.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院
中华人民共和国国防部
中国西昌卫星发射中心
中国人民解放军总装备部司令部
中国人民解放军总装备部
中国人民解放军战略支援部队

position.en: Deputy Commander and Chief of Staff

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会装备发展部
中国共产党第二十届中央委员会

description.zh-cn: 在李强担任总理期间，李尚福任国务委员，是其下属。
description.en: While Li Qiang served as Premier, Li Shangfu was a State Councilor, subordinate to him.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福作为中央军委委员和国防部长，是军委主席习近平的下属。
description.en: As a member of the Central Military Commission and Minister of National Defense, Li Shangfu was subordinate to CMC Chairman Xi Jinping.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福是李绍珠的儿子。
description.en: Li Shangfu is the son of Li Shaozhu.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福接替魏凤和出任国防部部长。
description.en: Li Shangfu succeeded Wei Fenghe as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 在李尚福被免职后，董军接任国防部部长职务。
description.en: After Li Shangfu was removed from office, Dong Jun succeeded him as Minister of National Defense.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福接替尚宏出任总装备部司令部参谋长。
description.en: Li Shangfu succeeded Shang Hong as Chief of Staff of the PLA General Armaments Department Headquarters.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福接替张又侠出任中央军委装备发展部部长。
description.en: Li Shangfu succeeded Zhang Youxia as Director of the CMC Equipment Development Department.

description.zh-cn: 因牵涉与俄罗斯的武器交易，美国国务院依据《以制裁反制美国敌人法案》对李尚福实施制裁。
description.en: Due to involvement in arms deals with Russia, the U.S. Department of State sanctioned Li Shangfu under the Countering America's Adversaries Through Sanctions Act.

relationships.target: 中央军事委员会装备发展部

description.zh-cn: 因牵涉与俄罗斯的武器交易，美国国务院依据《以制裁反制美国敌人法案》对中央军委装备发展部实施制裁。
description.en: Due to involvement in arms deals with Russia, the U.S. Department of State sanctioned the CMC Equipment Development Department under the Countering America's Adversaries Through Sanctions Act.

description.zh-cn: 李尚福因涉嫌严重违纪违法问题被立案审查，是2023年中国火箭军腐败案中的一部分。
description.en: Li Shangfu was placed under investigation for suspected serious violations of discipline and law as part of the 2023 PLA Rocket Force corruption case.

relationships.source: 中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 对李尚福严重违纪违法问题立案审查调查。
description.en: Filed a case for review and investigation into Li Shangfu's serious violations of discipline and law.

relationships.source: 第十四届全国人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 决定免去李尚福的国务委员、国防部部长及国家军委委员职务。
description.en: Decided to remove Li Shangfu from his positions as State Councilor, Minister of National Defense, and member of the state Central Military Commission.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央政治局

description.zh-cn: 审议通过关于李尚福问题审查结果和处理意见的报告，决定给予其开除党籍处分。
description.en: Reviewed and approved a report on the investigation and handling of Li Shangfu's case, deciding to expel him from the party.

description.zh-cn: 决定给予李尚福开除军籍处分，并取消其陆军上将军衔。
description.en: Decided to expel Li Shangfu from the military and revoke his rank of Army General.

relationships.source: 中国共产党第二十届中央委员会第三次全体会议

description.zh-cn: 会议确认将李尚福开除党籍。
description.en: The plenum confirmed the expulsion of Li Shangfu from the party.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军铁道兵西南指挥部
